definition: woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Add enough ice cubes and pour in cachaca.
sentences.chinese: 加入足夠冰塊，然後倒入朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Float 1oz Captain Morgan Spiced Rum on top.
sentences.chinese: 在頂部漂浮1盎司五香摩根船長朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Break an egg and offer it to the deceased with some rice and rum.
sentences.chinese: 打個蛋和米飯還有朗姆酒一起供奉給故人。

sentences.english: I want to be on a tropical paradise being served pina coladas all day long.
sentences.chinese: 我要到一個熱帶樂園，整天喝冰鎮果汁朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Soul Mate also boasts a selection of homemade flavored rums that are certainly one-of-a-kind in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 招牌的自制朗姆酒也絕對是南京獨一無二的。

sentences.english: Rum and translation lamb wine, is molasses distillation wine.
sentences.chinese: 朗姆酒又譯作蘭姆酒，是糖蜜蒸餾酒。

sentences.english: He has knocked back two double rums .
sentences.chinese: 他喝掉了兩杯雙料朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Drinkin white rum in a portugal bar.
sentences.chinese: 在葡萄牙的小酒吧裏喝着朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Jerry Thomas recommended floating a half-shot of dark rum.
sentences.chinese: 傑裏托馬斯建議加半子彈杯的朗姆酒。

sentences.english: Build into a collins glass, stir well, float 151% rum on top.
sentences.chinese: 兌和入可林直杯，充分攪合，注入適量151朗姆酒。

definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
